name: SKR4P
description:
here, I moved to Unity. Happy, dad?

anyway, skr4p is a game jam submission to gamedev.tv's jam. it is my first project in unity and thus features:

- bugs
- incomplete UI elements
- collision bugs
- respawn key (essential) 

but somehow its still quite fun, I guess a platformer with a wall jump can only be so bad.

all sprites and character designs are by Mark Davidovich.
programming, level/game design, sound effects and soundtrack by me.
